file_insights.purpose: Create Supabase server client for Next.js SSR

patterns_discovered: Server-side Supabase client creation with cookie management
Using environment variables for Supabase configuration
gotchas_discovered: Non-null assertion (!) used for environment variables
Potential issue if environment variables are not set
recommendations: Add error handling for missing environment variables
Consider adding type safety for environment variables
Implement a fallback mechanism if cookie store is unavailable
